    • 方法详细资料

      • setSlot2Disabled

        public boolean setSlot2Disabled(android.content.ComponentName who,
                                boolean isSubActive)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to allow ues the sub2 or forbid on the device. After set this, the device will be allowed or forbidden to use the sub2.
        参数:
        who - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        isSubActive - True is forbid use sub2 and false is allow.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isSlot2Disabled

        public boolean isSlot2Disabled(android.content.ComponentName who)
        Get the state of the device is allowed or forbidden to use sub2
        参数:
        who - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        true if forbid the device use sub2 and false is allow to use.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

        参数:

        isSubActive - True is forbid use sub2 data and false is allow.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setRoamingSyncDisabled

        public boolean setRoamingSyncDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      boolean allow)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to allow the automatic sync of account or forbid the automatic sync of account on the device, for this user. After calling this, the device will be allowed or forbidden the automatic sync of account.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        allow - True is forbid the automatic sync of account and false is allow.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isRoamingSyncDisabled

        public boolean isRoamingSyncDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed or forbidden the automatic sync of account,for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed or forbidden the automatic sync of account will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        返回:
        false if allow the automatic sync of account and true is forbid.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setRoamingPushDisabled

        public boolean setRoamingPushDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      boolean allow)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to allow the WAP PUSH messages or forbid the WAP PUSH messages in the mobile network on the device, for this user. After calling this, the device will be allowed or forbidden the WAP PUSH messages.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        allow - True is forbid the WAP PUSH messages and false is allow.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isRoamingPushDisabled

        public boolean isRoamingPushDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed or forbidden the WAP PUSH messages in the mobile network,for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed or forbidden the WAP PUSH messages will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        返回:
        false if allow the WAP PUSH messages and true is forbid.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setSimPinLock

        public boolean setSimPinLock(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             boolean enablePinLock,
                             java.lang.String pinCode,
                             int slotId)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to open or close pin lock.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        enablePinLock - true is open pin lock and false close pin lock.
        pinCode - is user's pin code.
        slotId - is slot id of the card you want to operate.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • changeSimPinCode

        public boolean changeSimPinCode(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                java.lang.String currentPinCode,
                                java.lang.String newPinCode,
                                int slotId)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to change pin code.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        currentPinCode - is the current pin code of the card.
        newPinCode - is the pin code of user want to use.
        slotId - is slot id of the card you want to operate.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setSMSLimitation

        public boolean setSMSLimitation(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                boolean isOutgoing,
                                int dateType,
                                int limitNumber)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed to ues the Sms receive or send limit, for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed to use the Sms receive or send limit will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - True is allowed to ues the Sms receive limit.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeSMSLimitation

        public boolean removeSMSLimitation(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   boolean isOutgoing,
                                   int dateType)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed or forbidden to ues the Sms receive or send limit, for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed or forbidden to use the Sms receive limit will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - True is allowed to ues the Sms receive limit.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_TELEPHONY} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isSMSLimitationSet

        public boolean isSMSLimitationSet(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                  boolean isOutgoing)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed or forbidden to ues the Sms limit, for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed or forbidden to use the vpn will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        isOutgoing - true: send Sms limit false: receive Sms limit
        返回:
        true if set sms limit successfully.
